description: A comprehensive suite of 50+ Free OSINT, Digital Forensics, and Cyber Investigation tools for Law Enforcement and Researchers.

tools.name: CDR Processor
tools.description: Analyze Call Detail Records for Indian ISPs (Jio, Airtel, VI, BSNL). Includes link analysis and tower mapping.

tools.name: BSA Analyzer
tools.description: Bank Statement Analysis tool to trace fund flow and identify suspect UPI IDs.

tools.name: TSDP Parser
tools.description: AI-powered Transaction Screenshot Data Parser. Extracts UTR, Amount, and Date from images.

tools.name: Lat Long Mapper
tools.description: Plot suspect coordinates, calculate air distance, and animate movement routes on maps.

tools.name: IFSC Lookup
tools.description: Bulk lookup for Indian Financial System Codes with branch geolocation.

tools.name: Cell Tower Locator
tools.description: Triangulate approximate location based on Cell ID and LAC data.

tools.name: CDR Analyzer Lite
tools.description: Standard Call Detail Record analysis utility for quick checks.

tools.name: Advanced Dork Builder
tools.description: GUI-based Google Dork generator for finding sensitive files and directories.

tools.name: Username Searcher
tools.description: Check username availability across 100+ social media platforms.

tools.name: Elite Persona Generator
tools.description: Create detailed fake identities for undercover operations.

tools.name: IoT Dork Generator
tools.description: Generate Shodan and Google dorks for finding open cameras and IoT devices.

tools.name: Email Permutator
tools.description: Generate potential email variations for a target name.

tools.name: Typosquatting Tool
tools.description: Generate potential phishing domain variations (DNSTwist Lite).

tools.name: UA Parser
tools.description: Decode User-Agent strings to identify device, OS, and browser details.

tools.name: Whois Lookup
tools.description: Retrieve domain registration, expiry, and ownership details.

tools.name: Subdomain Scanner
tools.description: Discover hidden subdomains of a target website.

tools.name: DNS Propagation
tools.description: Check DNS records (A, MX, NS) globally across multiple servers.

tools.name: Reverse Image Search
tools.description: Perform multi-engine image search to find source and duplicates.

tools.name: Image ELA Analyzer
tools.description: Error Level Analysis to detect fake or photoshopped images.

tools.name: Steganography Analyzer
tools.description: Detect and extract hidden data within image files (LSB).

tools.name: WhatsApp Forensic Viewer
tools.description: Visualize exported WhatsApp chat logs (.txt) in a readable format.

tools.name: PDF Metadata Extractor
tools.description: Extract header info and hidden metadata from PDF files.

tools.name: Stylometry Analyzer
tools.description: Analyze writing style and authorship attribution.

tools.name: Base64 File Converter
tools.description: Convert any file to Base64 string and back for forensic analysis.

tools.name: IP Calculator
tools.description: CIDR and Subnet mask calculations for network mapping.

tools.name: MAC Lookup
tools.description: Identify device manufacturer using MAC Address OUI.

tools.name: Email Header Analyzer
tools.description: Trace email origin, path, and delays via header analysis.

tools.name: Log Anomaly Heatmap
tools.description: Visual detection of activity spikes in server log files.

tools.name: Server Log Viewer
tools.description: Lightweight visualizer for parsing large server logs.

tools.name: Nmap Visualizer
tools.description: Visualize Nmap XML scan results in a browser-friendly format.

tools.name: URL Forensics
tools.description: De-obfuscate malicious URLs and analyze query parameters.

tools.name: IOC Extractor
tools.description: Extract IPs, Domains, and Hashes from threat reports.

tools.name: Phishing Kit Analyzer
tools.description: Analyze suspicious PHP/JS scripts and phishing kits safely.

tools.name: Onion Validator
tools.description: Check format validity of Dark Web V3 onion links.

tools.name: Visual Link Analysis
tools.description: Offline Mini-Maltego for visualizing connections between entities.

tools.name: Breach Parser
tools.description: Process and search through large breach dumps efficiently.

tools.name: Cyber Swiss Knife
tools.description: Universal Encoder/Decoder (Base64, Hex, Rot13, URL).

tools.name: Hash Toolkit
tools.description: Generate and Identify Hash types (MD5, SHA1, SHA256).

tools.name: Hashcat Generator
tools.description: Build complex Hashcat cracking commands via GUI.

tools.name: JWT Debugger
tools.description: Decode, verify, and analyze JSON Web Tokens.

tools.name: Password Strength Tool
tools.description: Test password strength and generate secure passwords.

tools.name: Credit Card Validator
tools.description: Validate credit card numbers and check BIN information.

tools.name: Secure QR Tool
tools.description: Generate or decode QR codes safely (Quishing protection).

tools.name: Report Builder
tools.description: Generate instant PDF investigation reports.

tools.name: Unix Timestamp Converter
tools.description: Convert Epoch timestamps to human-readable dates.

tools.name: JSON Analyzer
tools.description: Format, validate, and minify JSON data.

tools.name: Regex Builder
tools.description: Construct regular expressions for data scraping.

tools.name: Htaccess Generator
tools.description: Create secure Apache configuration files.

tools.name: Markdown Editor
tools.description: Live preview Markdown editor for documentation.

tools.name: Meta Tag Generator
tools.description: Generate SEO and Social Media meta tags.
